title: New Zed Skin Rito Please!

embed.description: League of Legends Blood Moon Zed Custom Skin. ► Improve LoL Game Speed With WTFast: ► http://bit.ly/WTFastShowCase Skin Name: Blood Moon Zed Skin Author: Sislex http://leaguecraft.com/skins/54873-blood-moon-zed-by-sislex.xhtml Download latest version of SIU: http://sites.google.com/site/siuupdates Pick champion for the next video! Vote here: http://www.facebook.com/SkinShowCase Follow me on twitter: http://twitter.com/SkinShowCase Follow me on google+: http://plus.google.com/+SkinShowCase Subscribe for more custom skin showcase videos!

body: I really hate how other champions that have 4+ skins are still getting more skins while champs like {{champion:238}} and {{champion:154}} are not getting any new skins.Look at {{champion:84}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:55}} etc..they have more than enough skins and they are still getting more.Headhunter akali is coming out and some Veigar skins are being  released soon.When will rito start to listen to user request? God damn im sick of waiting.

replies.body:
Sorry, but the there is already a full Blood Moon team comp (I main zed but sorry not gonna happen) http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Blood_Moon
Maybe a different theme man.
I was just stating one out of a hundred custom zed skins out there just for an example haha.Bloodmoon zed is not possible but there is still hundered+ for rito to choose from and make it official.

Ohhh... nm
My bad I thought u meant u wanted the bloodmoon zed haha
Yeah Zed's skins are old now he needs a new one. But riot needs to make it super badass!
Yeah,can't believe katarina got a new skin out and veigar has plenty of skins to be released.

Because riot needs money. They make skins for very popular champs that is how yasuo got a second skin already. Zac is not a very popular champ I haven't seen him being played by anyone for a while. So riot won't be making a skin for him for a while since no on plays him. It all about the money.
Isnt zed popular.Like 7/10 games you will see a zed in mid/top.
Well,if this post gets more than enough views for rito to see this maybe just maybe they will realise how badly zed users want a new skin.
